maps/heat-dng/f2/room-cold.json/entities.text: OK, la pause est officiellement finie, la course reprend !

maps/heat-dng/f2/room-cold.json/entities.orig: Press \i[cold] to switch to \c[3]cold mode\c[0] at any time!
maps/heat-dng/f2/room-cold.json/entities.text: Appuyez sur \i[cold] pour passer en \c[3]mode froid\c[0] à n'importe quel moment !

maps/heat-dng/f4/boss.json/entities/25/s.orig:
You can use the \c[3]\v[item.230.name]\c[0] to enter \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0] and \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]! 

Just travel to \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0] and head \c[3]eastward\c[0]!

PS: The \c[3]shop in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]\c[0] has \c[3]new equipment\c[0]!
maps/heat-dng/f4/boss.json/entities/25/s.text:
Vous pouvez utiliser le \c[3]Symbole de Flamme Rouge\c[0] pour entrer à \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0] et dans le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] !

Voyagez juste à \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0] et allez \c[3]vers l'est\c[0] !

PS : le \c[3]Magasin\c[0] à \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0] possède du \c[3]nouvel équipement\c[0] !

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Laser Moths.
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Des Mites Lasers.
... Salut.

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Oh! So you've met those, too...
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Oh ! Toi aussi, tu les as déjà vus ?

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Why?
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Why the Laser Moths?
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Pourquoi les Mites Lasers ?

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Uhm... I don't know...
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Heu... J'en ai aucune idée...

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: I want to strangle the person responsible for these enemies.
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Je vais étrangler la personne qui est responsable de ces ennemis.

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Gosh...
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Ouf...

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: By the way! The cold element is great, isn't it?
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Pendant qu'on y est ! L'élément froid est génial, non ?

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Uhm... Oui. I guess?
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Heu... Oui, j'imagine ?

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: You could almost say it is.\..\..\. cool!
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: On peut presque dire qu'il est.\..\..\. cool !

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: ...Oui.
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: ...Oui.

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: A-Anyway... It's refreshing to have it in this hot environment.
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: E-En tout cas... C'est rafraichissant, à côté de toute cette chaleur ici.

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: To be honest, I was really craving some ice cream since we've been running through the desert.
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Pour être honnête, j'ai vraiment envie d'une glace depuis que l'on coure à travers le désert.

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Oh~ Ice cream really would hit the spot right now!
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Oh~, Oui, avoir une glace maintenant ça serait parfait !

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: It's too bad you can't just summon it with one of those cold skills.
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: C'est dommage que l'on puisse pas en créer une avec nos pouvoirs froids.

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Man, how strange would that be?
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Hé, comment ça serait drôle !

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: I'd enjoy throwing ice cream at those laser moths and seeing them SUFFER!
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: J'aurais bien aimé leur balancer une glace à ces mites lasers pour les voir SOUFFRIR !

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Gosh... you really do hate those moths, don't you?
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Ouf... Tu ne peux vraiment pas les supporter ces mites, non ?

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Very much. Anyway, let's wrap up this race.
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Ça on peut le dire. En tout cas, finissons cette course.

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Yes! It shouldn't be much longer.
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Oui ! Ça ne devrait pas être beaucoup plus long.

maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.orig: Bye!
maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-east.json/enti.text: Bye !

maps/heat-dng/g/room-01.json/entities/21.orig: Oui, oui! And take your time!
maps/heat-dng/g/room-01.json/entities/21.text: Oui, oui ! Et prenez votre temps !

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Vers Salle de l'Équilibre 2
Bonjour !
Salut !

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: Wait, why a D-Link?\. Isn't this a race?
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Attends, pourquoi un D-Link ?\. Je croyais qu'on était dans une course ?
Oui. Et alors ?

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: Anyway, I guess you both have already met the new foes of this dungeon, non?
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Alors, j'imagine que vous deux vous avez déjà rencontré les nouveaux ennemis de ce donjon, non ?
Oh, tu veux dire ces Méduses ?

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: I don't care about the Jellyfish, Tronny.
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Les méduses ça m'est égal, Tronny.

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: Moths.\. They added moths.\. And once again, they are \c[3]huge\c[0].
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Les mites.\. Ils ont ajouté des mites.\. Et encore une fois, elles sont \c[3]immenses\c[0].
Et ? Qu'est-ce qu'elles ont ?

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: I hate bugs!\. And those things are close enough!
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Je déteste les insectes !\. Et ces machins s'en rapprochent suffisamment !
Ouf...

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: But didn't you know that moths play an important role in our ecosystem?
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Mais tu ne savais pas que les mites jouent un rôle important dans notre écosystème ?
Hein ?

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: Pollinating flowers, food source for birds...
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Pollinisation des fleurs, nourriture pour les oiseaux...

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: They are also a great indicator for the health of the environment!
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Ils sont aussi un bon indicateur de la santé de l'environnement !

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: To me they are only a great indicator for places I want to leave.
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Pour moi ils ont un bon indicateur des endroits dont je veux partir.

maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.orig: In conclusion: Moths suck! Race continues now!
maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cross.json/entit.text: Ou pour faire plus court : Les mites c'est nul ! On continue !
Bye !
À plus tard !
